page.title: 18A day in the life of a boy.
page.content: My name is Matthew.I am 9 and I live in Oddington.I normally get up at 7 am and get dressed and eat my breakfast.Then I go into the bathroom and wash myself and put my shoes on.Then me and my Mum and my Dad and my dog all get into our car and go to my Gran's house in Islip. When it is 20 past 8 Glenn comes and we go to school together.We play football for a bit with the other boys till the bell goes at 9.We have assembly,and work till 10.30 when there is a break.At 12 we have our sandwiches,go out to play till 1.15 then come in to work till 3.30.I go back to my Gran's and my Dad picks me up at 5 pm and we go home.I go down the lane for a ride on my motor bike,then I go for a walk and after that I go to bed.
